name: Elite Forces
description:
Play as elite agent in futuristic tactical territory agains other players worldwide. Try modes as demolition and plant bomb's, free for all, play with loyal members in team deathmatch or try capture the flag.
Create your perfect killer to dominate the area.
Choose from:
  • Tactical weapons: Assault/SMG/Sniper/LMG/Launcher/Pistol/Knife/Shotgun
  • Loadout: Primary/Secondary/Granade/Melee/Kit
  • Soldier: Choose your race in battlefield from infamous cyborg or tactical human
  • Skins
  • Attachments: Sight/Suppressor/Magazine/Vertical grip
Battle on other worlds, 3 maps to visit and explore. Galaxy world where city is futuristic and dominated by black hole effects (BEWARE). NEO city is excelent place for snipers and drivers of hover vehicles or visit SciFi city that has excellent view of far Earth.
Think strategically to get beyond others, with UAV discover others and bring them unseen, deadly starship shots and brings fear to battleground and last and most dangerous call death from above with missile strike.
Level up and get valuable rewards to use like you wish.
Visit store and get advanced items.
If you want to go global and get to compete in esports create clan and hold that first position.
Become most wanted Elite Force ever known
